Event.name: Cycle count
Event.Description: Counts the number of clock cycles. Every clock cycle increments the counter

Event.name: L1 D-Cache read miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache read misses (including non-cacheable and non-bufferable cache accesses)

Event.name: L1 D-Cache write miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache write misses (including non-cacheable and non-bufferable misses)

Event.name: TLB miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of instruction and data TLB misses

Event.name: Branches taken
Event.Description: Counts the number of times branch prediction correctly prefetches the required branch

Event.name: Write buffer full
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles WB is full

Event.name: L1 D-Cache read beat
Event.Description: Counts the number of times the bus returns data to the data cache during read requests

Event.name: L1 D-Cache write beat
Event.Description: Counts the number of times the bus returns ready to the data cache during write requests

Event.name: BIU any access
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the BIU is accessed by any unit

Event.name: WMMX2 hold write back stage
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the SIMD coprocessor holds in its writeback stage

Event.name: WMMX2 finish FIFO full
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the SIMD coprocessor retire FIFO is full

Event.name: L2-Cache read hit
Event.Description: The number of read accesses served from the L2C

Event.name: L2-Cache read miss
Event.Description: The number of L2C read accesses that resulted in an external read request
